page.title: 17HARVEST FESTIVALS
page.content: HARVEST FESTIVALS ARE A GREAT INSTITUTION IN THE AREA. WITH FARMING AS THE MAJOR EMPLOYMENT, HARVEST TAKES ON GREAT SIGNIFICANCE. EACH CHAPEL AND CHURCH HAS THEIR OWN SERVICE TO WHICH MANY PEOPLE GO. THIS PUTS A STRAIN ON THE LOCAL CLERGY WHO MAY HAVE TO PRODUCE SEVERAL DIFFERENT HARVEST ADDRESSES. THEIR DIGESTIONS ARE ALSO STRAINED BY OVEREATING AT THE VARIOUS HARVEST TEAS. IN THE METHODIST CHAPELS THERE IS A SUNDAY CELEBRATION, AND A MIDWEEK SERVICE FOLLO2ED BY A SUPPER AND OFTEN AN AUCTION OF PRODUCE. THESE OCCASIONS SATISFY BOTH A RELIGIOUS AND A SOCIAL NEED. OTHER MAJOR FESTIVALS ARE THE SUNDAY SCHOOL AND CHAPEL ANNIVERSARIES. THERE ARE SUNDAY SCHOOLS AT BOTH DOBWALLS AND TREVELMOND.
